letters.author: jadk157
letters.subject: Arden's 1st Day at School
letters.text: Hi Jerry! How are you doing? Just wanted to let you know that Arden's first day at school went pretty well. I think he was a little bit nervous at first but he was playing with a group of other kids by lunchtime

letters.text: Hi Angel! Hope you're doing well!
